name: ExitR: Unique Spaces ~ Oculus Quest VR game
name_original: ExitR: Unique Spaces ~ Oculus Quest VR game
description:
An escape room style game made for an immersive VR experience.

This game is a passion project made by a very small team, and you can currently play the first demo level.

Escape by solving the puzzles!

Discover new unique themes!

More levels and updates are coming soon!

You can play by standing or sitting. Stationary or room scale boundary are both supported. The movement modes are smooth locomotion and teleporting.

All feedback is greatly appreciated, please leave a rating and a review if you have any suggestions or oppinions you would like us to read.

Tested on Oculus Quest 2.
